long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nudge AI - EHR Integration for Mental Health Professionals

Streamline your mental health practice documentation with the official Nudge AI Chrome Extension. This professional tool enables seamless integration between Nudge AI's clinical documentation platform and your existing Electronic Health Record (EHR) system.

Key Features:
Direct EHR/EMR Integration: Compatible with major electronic health record platforms
One-Click Import: Easily transfer clinical notes and documentation from Nudge AI to your EHR
Secure Data Transfer: Maintains HIPAA compliance and data security standards
Time-Saving Workflow: Eliminate manual copy-pasting and reduce documentation time
Mental Health Focused: Specifically designed for behavioral health professionals

How It Works
Install the extension
Connect to your Nudge AI account
Access your Nudge AI notes directly within your EHR
Import notes and documentation with a single click

Supported EHR Systems
Works with popular electronic health record systems used by mental health professionals. Check our website for the full list of supported platforms.
Privacy & Security

No patient data is stored by the extension
Secure, encrypted data transfer
HIPAA-compliant implementation
Regular security updates

Who Should Use This:
Psychiatrists
Psychologists
Licensed Therapists
Mental Health Counselors
Clinical Social Workers
Behavioral Health Specialists

For support or questions, visit: https://getnudgeai.com
